/usr/lib/hpc/compiler/gnu/7/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/Gauss_Fit_2D_Example.dir/Gauss_Fit_2D_Example.o  -o ../Gauss_Fit_2D_Example   -L/scratch/gpi/seis/HEX/GpuFit/Gpufit/Gpufit  -Wl,-rpath,/scratch/gpi/seis/HEX/GpuFit/Gpufit/Gpufit ../libGpufit.so -Wl,-Bstatic -lcudart_static -Wl,-Bdynamic -lpthread -ldl -lrt
